infotext.entitydescription.cultistrobeshoodless: A dark garment traditionally worn by acolytes of the Church of Husk. Imbued with pheromones that pacify feral husks, helping the acolytes stay safe until they're ready to ascend.
infotext.entitydescription.huskchalice: A decorated Chalice used in ascension rituals.
infotext.entitydescription.de_nuclearbomb: A nuclear bomb, causing a massive fallout after detonation, killing everything in its path. 60 seconds until detonation when armed.
infotext.entitydescription.kazuyakumoradio: A radio Kazuya Kumo gave to you with a pre-configured frequency to call in a favor from her when docked to a separatist station.
infotext.entitydescription.duckysuit: A strange suit offered to you by your friend Jokster. It seems to be a custom modified PUCS suit with some swimming speed enhancements from the slipsuit.
infotext.entitydescription.commsrelayDE: A radio communication relay device which allows you to receive radio signals and communication.
infotext.entitydescription.giantrubberduck: A giant rubber duck to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.bigrubberduck: A big rubber duck to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.rubberduck: A rubber duck to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.giantpiraterubberduck: A giant rubber duck with a pirate hat and an eye patch to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.bigpiraterubberduck: A big rubber duck with a pirate hat and an eye patch to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.piraterubberduck: A rubber duck with a pirate hat and an eye patch to throw around and watch it float in water.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitPA: A heavily modified exosuit. It seems some pirates are quite crafty and managed to increase the stun resistance of this exosuit and allow the user to breath hull oxygen if available.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitplayerPA: A heavily modified exosuit. It seems some pirates are quite crafty and managed to increase the stun resistance of this exosuit and allow the user to breath hull oxygen if available.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitpartsPA: Damaged parts from a modified pirate exosuit.
infotext.entitydescription.dirtybombPA: An hand-crafted radioactive bomb to put inside a detonator, railgun ammunition or a depthcharge. Better keep your distance!
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclothesnovicePA: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit is mostly given to new hires and crew in lower positions.
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclothesPA: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit has been improved with light armor plating.
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclotheshardPA: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit is worn by more experienced crew members and higher-ups to protect them during combat.
infotext.entitydescription.constructionmaterialcr: A crate full of processed construction materials. Can be delivered to construction sites.
